summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of many-to-many relationships using explicit through models, confirming that creation and direct assignment are disallowed, that join queries are efficiently trimmed, and that related objects can be retrieved correctly in both forward and reverse directions, including scenarios with custom primary keys.
business_intent: Guarantee the Django ORM correctly enforces constraints and optimizes queries for many-to-many relations with intermediary tables, preventing improper usage and ensuring reliable data access for both sides of the relationship.
